sense.def:
A sketch
je nekaj, kar narišemo na hitro in v grobem.

To sketch something
pomeni narisati nekaj na hitro in v grobih potezah.

seg.quote: She began to sketch on a piece of paper.

sense.def:
A sketch of a situation or incident
je kratek opis položaja ali pripetljaja.

seg.quote: ...a brief sketch of the school's early history.

sense.def:
To sketch a situation or incident
pomeni nekaj na kratko opisati.

seg.quote: His rise to power is briefly sketched in the first two chapters.

sense.def:
A sketch
je tudi kratka humoristična točka, ki je največkrat del daljše zabavne predstave.

seg.quote: I loved the sketch about the dead parrot.
